title: English: Small Talk
description: Master the art of casual conversation.

items.example: By the way, have you seen the new café?
I think the weather will be nice tomorrow.
What do you think about the new restaurant?
Speaking of food, have you tried sushi?

blocks.content:
**Expressing opinions:**
- *I think / I believe / In my opinion*
- *I agree / I disagree*

**Follow-up questions:**
- *What about you?*
- *How about…?*
- *Really? Tell me more.*

**Hedging:**
- *I'm not sure, but…*
- *It depends on…*

blocks.prompt: Which is the best follow-up to 'I went to Paris last weekend'?
_____ my opinion, the best season is autumn.
Your colleague mentions they went on holiday. Write 4 sentences continuing the conversation. Ask questions and share your opinion.
Write a natural small talk conversation between two colleagues at a coffee machine. Cover at least two different topics. Show how they transition between subjects.
